Jonathan Horst | Digital Art Director / Visual Designer

I'm Jonathan Horst an independent digital art director and full stack designer. I love creating well functional, beautiful things. I'm passionate about helping people design success.

I get stoked engaging with people who care deeply about design and art. Who love both vision and detail. Who embrace the characteristics of material, medium and platform.

Past clients include: global brands, nonprofits, and boutique shops.
